sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lao feng 勞風 , exhaustion wind. Yin shan zheng yao 飲膳正要 Substance Entry ye tuo 野駝：駝 峰 , 治虛勞風。有冷積者 , 用葡萄酒溫調峰子油 , 服之良 , “Camel hump servesto cure depletion-exhaustion wind . For those with cold accumulation, mix warm grape wine and with the oil from a hump. To ingest this has good results”. Xu lei 虛羸 , depletion and thinness [41]

Alternative Names lei ruo 羸弱 , thinness and weakness; shou sun 瘦損 , emaciation detriment; xu shou 虛瘦 , depletion emaciation. Pathological Condition of xu 虛 , depletion, with an emaciated physical appearance, a depleted and weak proper qi, and decreased functions of the depots and palaces. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry shu yu 薯蕷：補虛羸，除寒熱邪氣 , “It supplements depletion and thinness , and it eliminates the evil qi of cold and heat”.
